text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Health (Termination of Pregnancy

title: (Termination of Pregnancy Services) (Safe Access Zones) Act 2024 (No. 13 of
heading: 2. The 17th day of October 2024 is appointed as the day on which the Health
text_raw:
2. The 17th day of October 2024 is appointed as the day on which the Health 
(Termination of Pregnancy Services) (Safe Access Zones) Act 2024 (No. 13 of 
2024) shall come into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

9 September, 2024. 

STEPHEN DONNELLY, 
Minister for Health. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 13th September, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [445] 3

title: (Termination of Pregnancy Services) (Safe Access Zones) Act 2024 (No. 13 of
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This Order appoints the 17th of October 2024 as the day on which the 
Health(Termination of Pregnancy Services) (Safe Access Zones) Act 2024 
comes into operation. This Act designates 100m Safe Access Zones around 
certain healthcare premises where conduct aimed at impeding access or 
influencing decisions in relation to termination of pregnancy services will be 
prohibited. The Bill also makes provision for enforcement and the creation of 
offences in relation to such conduct. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [445]
